forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. Southwest wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 72, with temperatures falling to around 70 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
In the tranquil hours of the early morning, a gentle parting of the clouds blankets Downtown San Francisco, revealing a temperature hovering comfortably around 56 degrees. As dawn approaches, a whispering southwest breeze makes its presence known, stirring the mildness of the air while thumbing at loose papers left on cafe tables. The horizon remains intact, though whispers of fog may cling to the edges of the Golden Gate. As the sun begins to assert its authority, brightness will unfurl across the city, promising a pleasant high near 72 degrees by afternoon.

The day ahead beckons with sunny cheer, a canvas of clarity awaiting those who wish to bask in its warmth. While the afternoon’s refrain brings gusts, playful at times, it still invites walks along the Embarcadero or a leisurely brunch in North Beach. Layers are advisable; a light jacket should ward off the evening's cool embrace when temperatures slide back down. Whether sipping on a latte while watching the world go by or even perusing the local bookstores, today is ideal for those seeking tranquility in daily routine. The scene unfolds with beauty, a gently flickering reminder of San Francisco's charm at the cusp of summer.
